caption.title: EGFR expression level does not correlate with the EGFR cluster size but with the number of clusters per area.
caption.p: A549 cells were transfected with plasmids for EGFR-mEos3.2 24h before the imaging experiments. On the day of the experiment, the cells were fixed and and imaged. In order to assess the expression level, we took a snapshot of the pre-converted green mEos version before photoconversion and PALM acquisition. We performed the DBSCAN cluster analysis for different cells at various expression levels ( A). We observed that the number of clusters per area increased at higher expression level, while the cluster radius was not affected ( B).
Click here for additional data file.
